name: Juno
tagline: OAuth2 based authentication service for credit unions and other financial institutions.
body:
### Juno
Juno is a server application that provides authentication services and an application registry for applications that interact with financial institutions.  This is to allow these applications access to member information without requiring that the member give the application their login credentials. It is an integral part of the [Pennyminder](http://www.pennyminder.com/) platform.  

### Cashbook

Juno is required for our hosted PFM [Cashbook](http://www.pennyminder.com/cashbook.html).  We are developing additional applications that utilize Juno and they will be available soon.

### License
The software is OpenSource and is licensed under the terms of the New BSD License. 

### Sponsor
We would like to thank [Mount Lehman Credit Union](https://www.mtlehman.com/) for graciously sponsoring the development of this software.

### Contact
We can help with deploying Juno at your financial institution. Contact Vince Hodges at vince@pennyminder.com or 604-603-1741
